p: ACE2 inactivates AngII and was shown to protect mice from sepsis-induced ALI, by downregulating RAS which is involved in pulmonary hypertension and pulmonary fibrosis; ACE2 expression increases after IFN-I administration. SARS-CoV infection produces a rapid downregulation of ACE2 expression at cell surface, ACE2 protein levels and RNA expression ( 83, 116).
